SELECT RESTAURANT_NO as "no", CITY_NO as "cityNo", RESTAURANT_NAME as "name", RESTAURANT_DETAIL as "detail", RESTAURANT_ADDRESS_DETAIL as "adressDetail", RESTAURANT_OPERATING_HOUR as "operatingHour", RESTAURANT_CLOSED_DATE as "closedDate", RESTAURANT_PHONE as "phone", RESTAURANT_FARE as "fare", RESTAURANT_PICTURE as "picture", RESTAURANT_LATITUDE as "latitude", RESTAURANT_LONGITUDE as "longitude", RESTAURANT_USE_NUM as "useNum" FROM Restaurant WHERE RESTAURANT_NO = #{vlaue}
